title: Gmail in Dark Mode on Pixel 4a?!
content:
Hello! I just switched to the new Pixel 4a! I synced everything from my Pixel 2, including setting the Theme default to Dark. Gmail, however, is not in dark mode and under Menu/General Settings...there is no Theme option?? 

Since it's not matching system default automatically, what should I do??
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
